about_the_game:
Our Fig campaign is Live! Come & get your sweet reward while it's hot! LINK to the FIG campaign available by clicking "Visit the website" on your right!


Jengo is a point & click in the purest old-school tradition. You know how it goes: you put your mouse pointer somewhere, clickety-click and something wicked happens. After a while, you begin to look for the most inappropriate items combination possible and test it out to see if the developers have the same kind of sick mind as yours.

In Jengo you play as Jeff, a disgruntled gaming prodigy seeking new challenges: the ultimate game, the one that will bring back some moisture in his eyes, and blister on his thumbs. Little does he know that his search will bring him to a strange, lonely place at the edge of the Pixelverse: Old Meta. Old Meta is a dumping ground for the Nobody-folk who were almost somebody - but have long lost their dreams at a watering hole in the middle of the desert. Now threatened by a large crack in the sky that consumes the land, they drink and gamble away their final days waiting for the end to come.

All they need is a hero... Sadly, considering the nature of forgotten places, no such hero ever came by, so they have now to settle on a gamer instead.

name: Jengo Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: A Point & Click in the purest old-school tradition. Help former gaming prodigy Jeff to save the Pixelverse from the Faceless Menace! Combine items in most inappropriate ways and solve carefully-cooked, brain-busting puzzles!
